### Prerequisites

- [ ] I have searched the existing [issues](https://github.com/chirag127/ClerkFlow-Secure-Auth-Browser-Extension/issues) to ensure this bug has not been reported before.
- [ ] I am using the latest version of the extension.
- [ ] I have read the [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/chirag127/ClerkFlow-Secure-Auth-Browser-Extension/blob/main/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Bug Description

A clear and concise description of what the bug is. Please provide as much detail as possible.

### Steps to Reproduce

Please provide a clear, step-by-step list of instructions to reproduce the behavior:

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

### Expected Behavior

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

### Actual Behavior

A clear and concise description of what actually happened. If applicable, include the full error message and stack trace.

### Screenshots or Screencasts

If applicable, add screenshots, GIFs, or a short video to help explain your problem. You can drag and drop files directly into this editor.

### Environment Details

Please complete the following information:

- **OS:** [e.g., macOS Sonoma 14.5, Windows 11, Ubuntu 22.04]
- **Browser & Version:** [e.g., Chrome 125.0.6422.112, Firefox 126.0]
- **Extension Version:** [e.g., v1.0.0, or commit hash if building from source]
- **Node.js Version:** [e.g., 20.11.0]

### Additional Context

Add any other context about the problem here. For example, are you behind a proxy? Are you using any other extensions that might interfere?
